milestones: Greenpeace tries to thwart Chesapeake Bay fishing fleet
NOAA says Earth's oceans becoming more acidic

wiki.text:
'Oyster Plant' is a common name used for various flowering plants, including:

*[[Tragopogon porrifolius]] (also called Purple Salsify) *[[Mertensia]]
[[Mertensia maritima|maritima]] *[[Tradescantia discolor]] Synonyms:
Tradescantia spathacea, Rhoeo spathacea, Rhoeo discolor. Family: Commelinaceae
Common names: Oyster Herb, Oyster Plant, Daun Kepah, Nanas Kerang, Boatlily (Cây
Lẻ Bạn, Lảo Bạn, Sò Huyết), Moses in a basket, Cradle Lily, Moses in His Cradle,
Moses on a Raft, Moses in the Bulrushes, Men in a Boat, Moses-in-
Cradle(Chinese): 蚌花
wiki.title: Oyster%20Plant
